description: A boxy panel van that was never meant to go fast. The handling is atrocious, the body roll is comical, and it has all the aerodynamics of a brick. But it's cheap, it's roomy, and there's something undeniably hilarious about beating someone in a race with a delivery van.
lore: Legend has it that someone once won a pink slip race in The Pit driving one of these. Nobody believed it until they saw the video. Now every crew has that one guy who insists he can make a delivery van fast. He can't. But he'll die trying.
